text_block_list.text: I love races.

――And the lead changes! It's Symboli Rudolf! She's 
ahead by a length! Will this be her 8th consecutive 
win, obtaining the Triple Crown while undefeated!?
text_block_list.name: Announcer

text_block_list.text:
I love races where them just running gets my 
blood pumping. I love races where the Uma Musume 
pour their all in to chasing their dreams.
Huu……Haaaaaaaaaaaa!!!!
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text:
――Symboli Rudolf……crosses the goal! An undefeated 
Triple Crown Uma Musume, now! Right here, has been born!
text_block_list.name: Announcer

text_block_list.text:
The whole world changes in an instant after crossing the goal. 
Records and memories woven together in to a drama――

――In conclusion! As you trainers know, in recent years, 
the racing world has really been heating up!
text_block_list.name: Chairman Akikawa

text_block_list.text:
For example! Classic Races that can only challenged once 
during your career…… [Satsuki Sho] [The Japan Derby] 
[Kikka Sho] ――commonly called the Classic Triple Crown!
text_block_list.name: Chairman Akikawa

text_block_list.text:
A set of races, where even winning just one will 
bestow honor! Further, winning all three of these…… 
becoming a Triple Crown Uma Musume, is a true feat!
text_block_list.name: Chairman Akikawa

text_block_list.text:
However, recently! In two consecutive years, a Triple 
Crown Uma Musume has appeared! With Symboli Rudolf 
becoming an unprecedented Undefeated Triple Crown!
text_block_list.name: Chairman Akikawa

text_block_list.text:
As a result! There has been an increase in the 
number of Uma Musume who aspire to race, making 
the role of trainer more and more important!
text_block_list.name: Chairman Akikawa

text_block_list.text:
Therefore, I have high expectations! As trainers, 
I'd like you to support the futures of each student! 
To further stir up the racing world!
text_block_list.name: Chairman Akikawa

text_block_list.text:
Hmmmmmm~! So you saw each of Symboli Rudolf's Triple Crown 
races in person, huh? I couldn't see them because of work.
text_block_list.name: Senpai Trainer

text_block_list.text:
The memories of that day overflowed, and the excitement was 
obvious in my voice. The enthusiasm of the Uma Musume and the 
excitement and expectations of the crowd……it was unforgettable

I see, I see. 
You really like races don't you?
text_block_list.name: Senpai Trainer

text_block_list.text:
Hahaa, how honest. With that much enthusiasm, it'd be great 
if you could raise the next Triple Crown Uma Musume, huh?
text_block_list.name: Senpai Trainer

text_block_list.text: Hm?
text_block_list.name: Senpai Trainer
choice_data_list: "First Ever" has a nice ring to it.

text_block_list.text:
! 
Then that means, you're aiming for――
text_block_list.name: Senpai Trainer

text_block_list.text:
There were already several Classic Triple Crown Uma 
Musume. However, in this country, there was still 
another Classic Crown that nobody had achieved yet.

『Oka Sho』 『Oaks』 『Shuuka Sho』…… 
The Crown for the winner of these three races――

I heard a small laugh……when I turned around, 
there was a mature-looking Uma Musume standing nearby.

She had appeared suddenly, and the atmosphere changed 
immediately. Her eyes had a mysterious color――
choice_data_list: (I can't take my eyes off her……)

text_block_list.text:
So, you want it, do you? 
A pure and dazzling treasure……

Then, you need to hurry. 
Before someone else……gets their hands on it.

…………………… Ha……! 
M-Mejiro Ramonu……
text_block_list.name: Senpai Trainer

text_block_list.text:
Famous in the racing world, the Mejiro family…… One after another, 
many strong Uma Musume bearing the name Mejiro have appeared.

And she was someone from that Mejiro family. They rarely 
ran in front of other people, and amongst the trainers, 
their true ability was a mystery. There were rumors though――

That mysterious aura and her cryptic words remained in my mind…… 
Now I was interested in just how she would run.

Ramonu. 
How is the painting progressing?
text_block_list.name: Grandmother

text_block_list.text:
Oh, grandmother. 
Just now, it's starting to look good. Take a look……
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text:
…………Is that so? 
Seems like……you've finally come close to completing it.
text_block_list.name: Grandmother

text_block_list.text:
Yes. I've made you wait quite a long time…… However, because 
of that, I'm very satisfied with the way it has taken shape.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text:
Yes, I can tell. Your heart…… is made quite 
clear in this picture. As expected, for you――
text_block_list.name: Grandmother

text_block_list.text:
The Tiara would be most suitable. Much more so than any 
trophy or crown…… Just by seeing your picture, I can tell.
text_block_list.name: Grandmother

text_block_list.text: ……Do you get it?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Family Servant A

text_block_list.text:
Not at all. It just looks like she's adding 
more colors on top of each other……
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Family Servant B

text_block_list.text:
Grandmother. From the moment these 
legs started running……I understood.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text: There was only one thing that should be placed on this head……
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text:
I'll devote it all. 
All of……――my love.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text:
It was several days after I had met Mejiro Ramonu. 
I wanted to see her run, so I was looking for her……

Hey! You should hurry up and head to the course! 
――Mejiro Ramonu is going to be running……real soon!
text_block_list.name: Senpai Trainer
